meta.name: description
meta.content: It is the mission of the Beekmantown Central School District and its community to educate every individual to be a quality contributor to society and self.

li.a: COVID-19 Resources for Parents Students and Teachers

div.div: If you have specific questions, please reach out to your child's teacher(s). You can also reach out to the building administration.
